page.title: 06LOCAL NEWS II
page.content: Silkstone Church's 20th garden party attended by the Mayor of Barnsley.Held at the vicarage. Silkstone W.I. The latest edition of the Village Newsletter has been circulated to every house in Silkstone.As well as a calendar of events,recipes and gardening tips have been included.Annual strawberry tea to be held on July 20th Good Companions enjoyed their annual outing to Llandudno,last Wednesday.When they meet next at the Methodist Church schoolroom they will be entertained by Keresforth Road School choir.
